show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

title: The House Of Cards
content:
A simplified explanation as to why the debt mountain is shortly going to collapse. A look at the Chinese credit bubble which has arrived at critical mass: lenders won’t lend and there are no further assets to pledge against credit guarantees.
It’s check-mate right there.
A quick overview of the latest Portuguese bank in trouble.
The falsely-held notion that education in American universities is superior internationally, even if scholastic achievement up to the high-school level is a disgrace.
College and university in the US fare no better.
The Ron Paul problem as expressed by Karl Denninger who also talks about more lies and made-up data by the Global Warming enthusiasts.
The staggering – and unjustified – growth of SWAT teams in the US The old housing ‘reset’ problem returns with a vengeance next year, opening a virtually certain new downward wave of real estate values and foreclosures.
Merkel goes to China to do business: Obama goes to complain.
No prizes for guessing who wins.
Antiquated banking in the US compared with Europe and Asia.
  Inventories of manufactured goods growing at a frightening pace.
